name: Let's go for some green! And I don't mean money... This is the ultimate park, church, castle tour inside Vienna! (Also in Winter)
description: The Steinhofgründe Park is some kind of "hidden treasure" in Vienna, because it is not commonly visited by tourists. Mainly it is the locals who have the luck of knowing about it and can enjoy it's vast variety of trees, colors and landscapes, all of which have a particular beauty in every season.
